pages.text: Sky spells can be found in Villages

pages.title: Propel
pages.text: Launches the user in the air for a short distance (additional for more spell power) $(li)Mana Cost: 10

pages.title: Gust
pages.text: Shoots a gust of wind that pushes back the target $(li)Mana Cost: 20

pages.title: Thunder Strike
pages.text: Strikes lightning down upon the target's head $(li)Mana Cost: 30 $(li)Range: 15

pages.title: Cloudshot
pages.text: Fire a spell cloud that deals high damage $(li)Mana Cost: 30

pages.title: Clearing Breeze
pages.text: Allows the user to clear the weather $(li)Mana Cost: 90

pages.title: Vacuum
pages.text: Pulls the target towards you quickly $(li)Mana Cost: 50
